00064 const char* MsgSocket::tag_start1 = "BIP/1.0";
00065 const char* MsgSocket::tag_start2 = "\r\n";
00066 const char* MsgSocket::tag_end = "\r\n";
00067 const char* MsgSocket::tag_str = "BIP/1.0 %08x %08x %08x\r\n";
00068 const char* MsgSocket::tag_prepared_hdr = "BIP/1.0                   %08x\r\n";
00069 const char* MsgSocket::tag_prepared_serv = "%08x %08x";
00070
00071 const int MsgSocket::pid_size = 8;
00072 const int MsgSocket::mid_size = 8;
00073 const int MsgSocket::len_size = 8;

00075
00076 const int MsgSocket::tag_end_size = (const int)strlen(MsgSocket::tag_end);
00077 const int MsgSocket::tag_size = (const int)(strlen(tag_start1) + 1 + MsgSocket::pid_size + 1 + MsgSocket::mid_size + 1 + MsgSocket::len_size + strlen(tag_start2));

00136 MsgSocket::~MsgSocket()
00137 {
00138     // We do not wan to callback anything more...
00139     // Remove the list
00140     RemoveAllCallbackObjects();
00141
00142     Stop();
00143
00144     if ( socket )
00145     {
00146         socket->Close();
00147         delete socket;
00148     }
00149
00150     if( buffer )
00151     {
00152         delete [] buffer;
00153         buffer = NULL;
00154     }
00155     if( buffer_udp_send )
00156     {
00157         delete [] buffer_udp_send;
00158         buffer_udp_send = NULL;
00159     }
00160     if( start_tag )
00161     {
00162         delete [] start_tag;
00163         start_tag = NULL;
00164     }
00165     if ( SendBuffer )
00166     {
00167         delete [] SendBuffer;
00168         SendBuffer = NULL;
00169     }
00170 }

00186 bool MsgSocket::SetSyncLinkData( SimpleString DataForSL )
00187 {
00188     if ( DataForSL.GetLength() <= 0 )
00189         return false;
00190
00191     protectSend.EnterMutex();
00192
00193     if ( receivedSyncLinkMsg == true || sendSyncLinkMsg == true )
00194     {
00195         // TOO LATE
00196 #ifdef DEBUG
00197         if ( Debug & DBG_LINKSYNC )
00198         {
00199             fprintf( stderr, "MsgSocket::SetSyncLinkData: connexion already open. Can not set SyncLink data.\n" );
00200         }
00201 #endif
00202         protectSend.LeaveMutex();
00203         return false;
00204     }
00205
00206     // Copy data and set Length
00207     SyncLinkData = DataForSL;
00208
00209     protectSend.LeaveMutex();
00210     return true;
00211 }

00213 bool MsgSocket::SetPeerSyncLinkData( char* DataForSL, int DataLength )
00214 {
00215     if ( DataForSL == NULL || DataLength <= 0 )
00216         return false;
00217
00218     protectSend.EnterMutex();
00219
00220     if ( PeerSyncLinkData.GetLength() != 0 )
00221     {
00222         // TOO LATE
00223 #ifdef DEBUG
00224         if ( Debug & DBG_LINKSYNC )
00225         {
00226             fprintf( stderr, "MsgSocket::SetPeerSyncLinkData: Peer SyncLink data already set.\n" );
00227         }
00228 #endif
00229         protectSend.LeaveMutex();
00230         return false;
00231     }
00232
00233     TemporaryMemoryBuffer Buffer( DataLength+1 );
00234     memcpy( (char*)Buffer, DataForSL, DataLength );
00235     ((char*)Buffer)[DataLength] = '\0';
00236
00237     PeerSyncLinkData = Buffer;
00238
00239     protectSend.LeaveMutex();
00240     return true;
00241 }

00268 int MsgSocket::PrepareBufferForBip(char * buf, const char * data, int datalen, bool OnlyHeader /*= false */)
00269 {
00270     char * Where;
00271
00272     if ( OnlyHeader == true )
00273     {
00274         // write the len of the buffer
00275         sprintf( buf, tag_prepared_hdr, datalen );
00276
00277         return (tag_size);
00278     }
00279     // else
00280
00281     if ( buf == NULL || datalen > maxBIPMessageSize )
00282     {
00283         return -1;
00284     }
00285
00286     // write the len of the buffer
00287     sprintf( buf, tag_prepared_hdr, datalen );
00288
00289     // We like to skip the place of the BIP header
00290     Where = buf + tag_size;
00291     // Just copy the data into the Buffer
00292     memmove( Where, data, datalen );
00293     // We need to write the end tag
00294     Where = Where + datalen;
00295     memcpy( Where, tag_end, tag_end_size );
00296
00297     return (tag_size + datalen + tag_end_size);
00298 }
00299
00300 int MsgSocket::PrepareBufferForBipFromCuttedMsg(char * buf, int* tab_length, const char** tab_buf, int nb_buf)
00301 {
00302     char * Where;
00303     int TotalLen;
00304     int i;
00305
00306     if ( tab_length == NULL || tab_buf == NULL || nb_buf <= 0 )
00307     {
00308         return -1;
00309     }
00310
00311     // Compute the TotalLen of the Buffer
00312     TotalLen = 0;
00313     for( i = 0; i < nb_buf; i++ )
00314     {
00315         TotalLen += tab_length[i];
00316     }
00317
00318     if ( TotalLen > maxBIPMessageSize )
00319     {
00320         return -1;
00321     }
00322
00323     // Ok, we have enougth space, start to fill the buffer
00324     // write the begining of the buffer and the len of the buffer
00325     sprintf( buf, tag_prepared_hdr, TotalLen );
00326
00327     // We like to skip the place of the BIP header
00328     Where = buf + tag_size;
00329
00330     for( i = 0; i < nb_buf; i++ )
00331     {
00332         // Just copy the data into the Buffer
00333         memmove( Where, tab_buf[i], tab_length[i] );
00334
00335         // We need to move up to the end of this new part
00336         Where += tab_length[i];
00337     }
00338
00339     // Now, we put the enbd of the BIP message
00340     memcpy( Where, tag_end, tag_end_size );
00341
00342     // We compute the len of the full message
00343     return (tag_size + TotalLen + tag_end_size);
00344 }
00345
00346
00347 int MsgSocket::WriteHeaderForBip(char * buf, int service_id, int message_id )
00348 {
00349     char * Where;
00350
00351     if ( buf == NULL )
00352     {
00353         return -1;
00354     }
00355
00356     Where = buf + strlen(tag_start1) + 1; // Just skip 'BIP/1.0 '
00357     // Print service ID and packet number
00358     sprintf( Where, tag_prepared_serv, service_id, message_id );
00359     // replace the '\0' from the previous printf to the old value : ' '
00360     Where[8+8+1] = ' ';
00361
00362     return 0;
00363 }

00366 void MsgSocket::InitForTcpClient(const SimpleString addr, int port)
00367 {
00368     socket->Connect(addr, port);
00369     bufferSize = TCP_BUFFER_SIZE;
00370     buffer = new OMISCID_TLM unsigned char[bufferSize];
00371     if ( buffer == NULL )
00372     {
00373         throw MsgSocketException( "Not enougth memory" );
00374     }
00375     SendBuffer = new OMISCID_TLM unsigned char[TCP_BUFFER_SIZE];
00376     if ( SendBuffer == NULL )
00377     {
00378         throw MsgSocketException( "Not enougth memory" );
00379     }
00380     start_tag = new OMISCID_TLM char[tag_size+1];
00381     if ( start_tag == NULL )
00382     {
00383         throw MsgSocketException( "Not enougth memory" );
00384     }
00385     kind = TCP_CLIENT_KIND;
00386     connected = true;
00387     occupiedSize = 0;
00388 }

00416
00417 bool MsgSocket::AddCallbackObject(MsgSocketCallbackObject * CallbackObject)
00418 {
00419     // lock the list
00420     CallbackObjects.Lock();
00421
00422     // Is the Callback object already in the list ?
00423     for( CallbackObjects.First(); CallbackObjects.NotAtEnd(); CallbackObjects.Next() )
00424     {
00425         if ( CallbackObjects.GetCurrent() == CallbackObject )
00426         {
00427             // unlock the list
00428             CallbackObjects.Unlock();
00429
00430             // Could not add trice the same listener
00431             return false;
00432         }
00433     }
00434
00435     // Add the listener
00436     CallbackObjects.Add( CallbackObject );
00437
00438     // unlock the list
00439     CallbackObjects.Unlock();
00440
00441     return true;
00442 }
00443
00444
00448 bool MsgSocket::RemoveCallbackObject(MsgSocketCallbackObject * CallbackObject)
00449 {
00450     // lock the list
00451     CallbackObjects.Lock();
00452
00453     // Is the Callback object already in the list ?
00454     for( CallbackObjects.First(); CallbackObjects.NotAtEnd(); CallbackObjects.Next() )
00455     {
00456         if ( CallbackObjects.GetCurrent() == CallbackObject )
00457         {
00458             // Found ! Remove it
00459             CallbackObjects.RemoveCurrent();
00460
00461             // unlock the list
00462             CallbackObjects.Unlock();
00463
00464             // ok, we remove it
00465             return true;
00466         }
00467     }
00468
00469     // unlock the list
00470     CallbackObjects.Unlock();
00471
00472     // We did not find it
00473     return false;
00474 }
00475
00476 void MsgSocket::RemoveAllCallbackObjects()
00477 {
00478     // lock the list
00479     CallbackObjects.Lock();
00480
00481     // Empty the list
00482     CallbackObjects.Empty();
00483
00484     // unlock the list
00485     CallbackObjects.Unlock();
00486 }

00488 void MsgSocket::SetCallbackSyncLink(Callback_SyncLink cr, void* user_data1, void* user_data2)
00489 {
00490     mutex.EnterMutex();
00491
00492     callbackSyncLinkFct = cr;
00493
00494     callbackSyncLinkData.Msg.len = 0;
00495     callbackSyncLinkData.Msg.buffer = NULL;
00496     callbackSyncLinkData.userData1 = user_data1;
00497     callbackSyncLinkData.userData2 = user_data2;
00498
00499     mutex.LeaveMutex();
00500 }
00501
00502 bool MsgSocket::SendSyncLinkMsg()
00503 {
00504     int TotalLen;
00505
00506     protectSend.EnterMutex();
00507
00508     if ( SyncLinkMsgSent() )
00509     {
00510 #ifdef DEBUG
00511         if ( Debug & DBG_LINKSYNC )
00512         {
00513             fprintf( stderr, "SendSyncLinkMsg: warning SyncLinkMsg already sent.\n" );
00514         }
00515 #endif
00516         protectSend.LeaveMutex();
00517         return false;
00518     }
00519
00520     if ( message_id != 0 )
00521     {
00522         fprintf( stderr, "SendSyncLinkMsg: error SyncLinkMsg should be numbered as 0 not %u.\n", message_id );
00523         protectSend.LeaveMutex();
00524         throw SocketException( "MsgSocket::SendSyncLinkMsg: error SyncLinkMsg should be numbered as 0." );
00525     }
00526
00527     try
00528     {
00529         if ( SyncLinkData.GetLength() != 0 )
00530         {
00531             TotalLen = PrepareBufferForBip( (char*)SendBuffer, (const char*)SyncLinkData.GetStr(), SyncLinkData.GetLength() );
00532         }
00533         else
00534         {
00535             TotalLen = PrepareBufferForBip( (char*)SendBuffer, "", 0 );
00536         }
00537         if ( TotalLen == -1 )
00538         {
00539             protectSend.LeaveMutex();
00540             return false;
00541         }
00542
00543         // We complete the header with a message id = 0
00544         WriteHeaderForBip( (char*)SendBuffer, service_id, message_id );
00545
00546         message_id++;
00547
00548 #ifdef DEBUG
00549         if ( Debug & DBG_LINKSYNC )
00550         {
00551             SendBuffer[TotalLen] = '\0';
00552             fprintf( stderr, "SendSyncLinkMsg: %s (%d)\n", SendBuffer, TotalLen );
00553         }
00554 #endif
00555 
00556         if ( (TotalLen = socket->Send(TotalLen, (char*)SendBuffer)) == -1)
00557         {
00558             TotalLen = -1;
00559         }
00560
00561         sendSyncLinkMsg = true;
00562         protectSend.LeaveMutex();
00563
00564         return (TotalLen > 0);
00565     }
00566     catch(SocketException& e)
00567     {
00568         OmiscidTrace( "SocketException: %s %d\n", e.msg.GetStr(), e.err);
00569         if ( connected )
00570         {
00571             // Send disconnected message
00572             CallbackObjects.Lock();
00573             // Send info to all listener
00574             for( CallbackObjects.First(); CallbackObjects.NotAtEnd(); CallbackObjects.Next() )
00575             {
00576                 try
00577                 {
00578                     CallbackObjects.GetCurrent()->Disconnected(*this, GetPeerPid());
00579                 }
00580                 catch(SocketException&) {} // Discard it
00581             }
00582             CallbackObjects.Unlock();
00583             connected = false;
00584         }
00585         protectSend.LeaveMutex();
00586         return false;
00587     }
00588 }
00589
00590 void FUNCTION_CALL_TYPE MsgSocket::Run()
00591 {
00592     switch (kind)
00593     {
00594     case TCP_SERVER_KIND:
00595         while(connected && !StopPending())
00596         {
00597             //printf("MsgSocket::run : tcp_server loop\n");
00598             AcceptConnection();
00599         }
00600         break;
00601
00602     case TCP_CLIENT_KIND:
00603         while(connected && !StopPending())
00604         {
00605             //printf("MsgSocket::run : tcp_client loop\n");
00606             Receive();
00607         }
00608         break;
00609
00610     case UDP_EXCHANGE_KIND:
00611         while(connected && !StopPending())
00612         {
00613             ReceiveUdpExchange();
00614         }
00615         break;
00616
00617     default:
00618         OmiscidError( "run : unknown type of connection\n");
00619         break;
00620     }
00621 }
00622
00623 void MsgSocket::Stop()
00624 {
00625     if ( connected )
00626     {
00627         // Send disconnected message
00628         CallbackObjects.Lock();
00629         // Send info to all listener
00630         for( CallbackObjects.First(); CallbackObjects.NotAtEnd(); CallbackObjects.Next() )
00631         {
00632             try
00633             {
00634                 CallbackObjects.GetCurrent()->Disconnected(*this, GetPeerPid());
00635             }
00636             catch(SocketException&) {} // Discard it
00637         }
00638         CallbackObjects.Unlock();
00639         connected = false;
00640     }
00641     Thread::StopThread(0);
00642 }
00643
00644 void MsgSocket::Receive()
00645 {
00646     try
00647     {
00648         if(socket->Select())
00649         {
00650             int nb_read = socket->Recv(bufferSize-occupiedSize, (buffer+occupiedSize));
00651             // OmiscidTrace( "%d %d \n ",nb_read, occupiedSize);
00652             if(nb_read == 0)
00653             {
00654                 if ( connected )
00655                 {
00656                     // Send disconnected message
00657                     CallbackObjects.Lock();
00658                     // Send info to all listener
00659                     for( CallbackObjects.First(); CallbackObjects.NotAtEnd(); CallbackObjects.Next() )
00660                     {
00661                         try
00662                         {
00663                             CallbackObjects.GetCurrent()->Disconnected(*this,GetPeerPid());
00664                         }
00665                         catch(SocketException&) {} // Discard it
00666                     }
00667                     CallbackObjects.Unlock();
00668                     connected = false;
00669                 }
00670                 return ;
00671             }
00672             occupiedSize += nb_read;
00673
00674             // For printing stuff...
00675             buffer[occupiedSize] = '\0';
00676
00677             bool stop = false;
00678             unsigned int length_msg, pid, mid;
00679             int length_header;
00680
00681             int offset = 0;
00682             int size = occupiedSize;
00683             while ( connected == true && stop == false )
00684             {
00685                 length_msg = pid = mid = 0;
00686                 if((length_header = GoodBeginning(buffer+offset, size, length_msg, pid, mid)) != 0)
00687                 {
00688                     //cerr << "good beginning ";
00689                     //cerr.write(aBuffer+offset, keyword_min);
00690                     //cerr << endl;
00691                     if ( mid == 0 )
00692                     {
00693 #ifdef DEBUG
00694                         if ( Debug & DBG_LINKSYNC )
00695                         {
00696                             // buffer[offset+offset+length_msg+tag_size] = '\0';
00697                             fprintf( stderr, "MsgSocket::Receive: %s\n", buffer+offset );
00698                         }
00699 #endif
00700                         peer_pid = pid;
00701
00702                         mutex.EnterMutex();
00703                         if ( callbackSyncLinkFct )
00704                         {
00705                             *(buffer+offset+tag_size+length_msg)='\0';
00706                             callbackSyncLinkData.Msg.len = length_msg;
00707                             if ( length_msg != 0 )
00708                             {
00709                                 callbackSyncLinkData.Msg.buffer =  (char*)buffer+offset+tag_size;
00710                             }
00711                             else
00712                             {
00713                                 callbackSyncLinkData.Msg.buffer =  NULL;
00714                             }
00715                             callbackSyncLinkData.Msg.origine = FromTCP;
00716                             callbackSyncLinkData.Msg.pid = pid;
00717                             callbackSyncLinkData.Msg.mid = mid;
00718                             try
00719                             {
00720                                 (*callbackSyncLinkFct)( &callbackSyncLinkData, this );
00721                             }
00722                             catch( SocketException& e )
00723                             {
00724                                 mutex.LeaveMutex();
00725                                 throw e;
00726                             }
00727                         }
00728                         mutex.LeaveMutex();
00729
00730                         //std::cout << "Link connexion Msg from "<<pid<<"\n";
00731                         receivedSyncLinkMsg = true;
00732                         if( SyncLinkMsgSent() == false )
00733                         {
00734                             SendSyncLinkMsg();
00735                         }
00736
00737                         if ( length_msg != 0 )
00738                         {
00739                             SetPeerSyncLinkData( (char*)(buffer+offset+length_header), length_msg );
00740                         }
00741
00742                         // Let's say we have a new connected peer
00743                         CallbackObjects.Lock();
00744                         // Send info to all listener
00745                         for( CallbackObjects.First(); CallbackObjects.NotAtEnd(); CallbackObjects.Next() )
00746                         {
00747                             try
00748                             {
00749                                 CallbackObjects.GetCurrent()->Connected(*this,pid);
00750                             }
00751                             catch(SocketException& e)
00752                             {
00753                                 // Unlock the list
00754                                 CallbackObjects.Unlock();
00755
00756                                 // Thow the exception
00757                                 throw e;
00758                             }
00759                         }
00760                         CallbackObjects.Unlock();
00761
00762                         offset += length_header + tag_end_size;
00763                         size =  occupiedSize - offset;
00764
00765                         // Ok, we have someone connected
00766                     }
00767                     //                                  else if(length_msg == 0)
00768                     //                                  {
00769                     //                                          //std::cout << "Empty Msg from "<<pid<<"\n";
00770                     //                                          offset += length_header;
00771                     //                                          size =  occupiedSize - offset;
00772                     //                                  }
00773                     else if ( (unsigned int)size < length_header + length_msg + tag_end_size )
00774                     {
00775                         // OmiscidTrace( "wait more byte\n");
00776                         int total = (int)(length_header + length_msg + tag_end_size);
00777                         if ( total >= bufferSize )
00778                         {
00779                             OmiscidTrace( "buffer too small : new buffer allocation\n");
00780                             //allocation new buffer
00781                             bufferSize = (total+1023)&~1023; // bufferSize = total arrondi au kilo d'octet superieur
00782                             unsigned char* tmp_buffer = new OMISCID_TLM unsigned char[bufferSize];
00783                             if(tmp_buffer)
00784                             {
00785                                 memcpy(tmp_buffer, buffer+offset, size*sizeof(unsigned char));
00786                                 offset = 0;
00787                                 occupiedSize = size;
00788                                 delete [] buffer;
00789                                 buffer = tmp_buffer;
00790                             }
00791                         }
00792                         stop = true;
00793                     }
00794                     else
00795                     {
00796                         offset += length_header;
00797
00798                         unsigned char* msgptr =  (buffer+offset);
00799
00800                         //verif end tag
00801                         if( memcmp(tag_end, (msgptr + length_msg), tag_end_size))
00802                         {
00803                             OmiscidTrace( "warning end tag\n");
00804                             size =  occupiedSize - offset;
00805                         }
00806                         else
00807                         {
00808                             offset += length_msg + tag_end_size;
00809                             size =  occupiedSize - offset;
00810 #ifdef DEBUG
00811                             if ( Debug & DBG_RECV )
00812                             {
00813                                 if ( length_msg != 0 )
00814                                 {
00815                                     SimpleString SFormat = "MsgSocket::Recv: %";
00816                                     SFormat += length_msg;
00817                                     SFormat += ".";
00818                                     SFormat += length_msg;
00819                                     SFormat += "s\n";
00820                                     fprintf( stderr, SFormat.GetStr(), msgptr );
00821                                 }
00822                                 else
00823                                 {
00824                                     fprintf( stderr, "MsgSocket::Recv: <empty>\n" );
00825                                 }
00826                             }
00827 #endif
00828                             // Send info to all receiver
00829                             CallbackObjects.Lock();
00830                             if ( CallbackObjects.GetNumberOfElements() )
00831                             {
00832                                 // Prepare data
00833                                 *(msgptr+length_msg)='\0';
00834                                 callbackData.Msg.len = length_msg;
00835                                 if ( length_msg != 0 )
00836                                 {
00837                                     callbackData.Msg.buffer =  (char*)msgptr;
00838                                 }
00839                                 else
00840                                 {
00841                                     callbackData.Msg.buffer =  (char*)NULL;
00842                                 }
00843                                 callbackData.Msg.origine = FromTCP;
00844                                 callbackData.Msg.pid = pid;
00845                                 callbackData.Msg.mid = mid;
00846
00847                                 // Send info to all listener
00848                                 for( CallbackObjects.First(); CallbackObjects.NotAtEnd(); CallbackObjects.Next() )
00849                                 {
00850                                     try
00851                                     {
00852                                         CallbackObjects.GetCurrent()->Receive(*this, callbackData);
00853                                     }
00854                                     catch(SocketException& e)
00855                                     {
00856                                         // Unlock the list
00857                                         CallbackObjects.Unlock();
00858
00859                                         // Throw the exception
00860                                         throw e;
00861                                     }
00862                                 }
00863                             }
00864                             CallbackObjects.Unlock();
00865                         }
00866                     }
00867                 }
00868                 else
00869                 {
00870                     //cerr << "Decalage\n";
00871                     int dec;
00872                     if(!MoveToMessage(buffer+offset, size, dec))
00873                     {
00874                         stop = true;
00875                         size -= dec;
00876                         offset += dec;
00877                     }
00878                     else
00879                     {
00880                         offset += dec;
00881                         size -= dec;
00882                     }
00883                 }
00884             }
00885             occupiedSize = size;
00886             if ( occupiedSize != 0 && offset != 0 )
00887             {
00888                 memmove(buffer, buffer+offset, occupiedSize);
00889                 // offset is local. It will be set to 0 again.
00890             }
00891         }
00892     }
00893     catch(SocketException& e)
00894     {
00895         OmiscidTrace( "SocketException: %s %d\n", e.msg.GetStr(), e.err);
00896         if ( connected )
00897         {
00898             // Send disconnected message
00899             CallbackObjects.Lock();
00900             // Send info to all listener
00901             for( CallbackObjects.First(); CallbackObjects.NotAtEnd(); CallbackObjects.Next() )
00902             {
00903                 try
00904                 {
00905                     CallbackObjects.GetCurrent()->Disconnected(*this,GetPeerPid());
00906                 }
00907                 catch(SocketException&) {} // Discard
00908             }
00909             CallbackObjects.Unlock();
00910             connected = false;
00911         }
00912     }
00913 }
00914
00915 void MsgSocket::AcceptConnection()
00916 {
00917     //std::cerr << "in MsgSocket::acceptConnection\n";
00918     Socket* sock = socket->Accept();
00919     if(sock)
00920     {
00921         AcceptConnection(new MsgSocket(sock));
00922     }
00923 }
00924
00925 bool MsgSocket::AcceptConnection(MsgSocket* ms)
00926 {
00927     //std::cerr << "in MsgSocket::acceptConnection(MsgSocket*)\n";
00928     delete ms;
00929     return false;
00930 }
00931
00932 int MsgSocket::Send(int Sendlen, const char* buf)
00933 {
00934     int TotalLen = 0;
00935
00936     protectSend.EnterMutex();
00937     try
00938     {
00939         if ( Sendlen > maxBIPMessageSize )
00940         {
00941             int HeaderSend      = 0;
00942             // int BodySend     = 0;
00943             int TailerSend      = 0;
00944             // int ResSend              = 0;
00945
00946             // OmiscidTrace( "Message too big for one TCP frame (size=%d, sizemax=%d) sends many.\n", Sendlen, maxMessageSizeForTCP);
00947             TotalLen = PrepareBufferForBip( (char*)SendBuffer, NULL, Sendlen, true );
00948             if ( TotalLen == -1 )
00949             {
00950                 protectSend.LeaveMutex();
00951                 return -1;
00952             }
00953
00954             // We complete the header
00955             WriteHeaderForBip( (char*)SendBuffer, service_id, message_id );
00956
00957             // Increase the number for the next message
00958             message_id++;
00959
00960             // Send header
00961             HeaderSend = socket->Send(TotalLen, (char*)SendBuffer);
00962
00963             if ( HeaderSend != TotalLen )
00964             {
00965                 return -1;
00966             }
00967
00968             // Let's send data...
00969             TotalLen = socket->Send( Sendlen, (char*)(buf) );
00970             if ( TotalLen == SOCKET_ERROR )
00971             {
00972                 return -1;
00973             }
00974
00975             TailerSend = socket->Send( tag_end_size, tag_end );
00976             if ( TailerSend == SOCKET_ERROR )
00977             {
00978                 return -1;
00979             }
00980
00981             return HeaderSend + TotalLen + TailerSend;
00982         }
00983
00984         TotalLen = PrepareBufferForBip( (char*)SendBuffer, buf, Sendlen );
00985         if ( TotalLen == -1 )
00986         {
00987             protectSend.LeaveMutex();
00988             return -1;
00989         }
00990
00991         // We complete the header
00992         WriteHeaderForBip( (char*)SendBuffer, service_id, message_id );
00993
00994         // Increase the number for the next message
00995         message_id++;
00996
00997         // if ( (TotalLen = socket->Send(TotalLen, (char*)SendBuffer)) == -1)
00998         // {
00999         //      TotalLen = -1;
01000         //}
01001         TotalLen = socket->Send(TotalLen, (char*)SendBuffer);
01002
01003 #ifdef DEBUG
01004         if ( Debug & DBG_SEND )
01005         {
01006             SendBuffer[TotalLen] = '\0';
01007             fprintf( stderr, "MsgSocket::Send: %s (%d)\n", SendBuffer, TotalLen );
01008         }
01009 #endif
01010 
01011         protectSend.LeaveMutex();
01012         return (TotalLen-tag_end_size-tag_size);
01013     }
01014     catch(SocketException& e)
01015     {
01016         OmiscidTrace( "SocketException: %s %d\n", e.msg.GetStr(), e.err);
01017         if ( connected )
01018         {
01019             // Send disconnected message
01020             CallbackObjects.Lock();
01021             // Send info to all listener
01022             for( CallbackObjects.First(); CallbackObjects.NotAtEnd(); CallbackObjects.Next() )
01023             {
01024                 try
01025                 {
01026                     CallbackObjects.GetCurrent()->Disconnected(*this,GetPeerPid());
01027                 }
01028                 catch(SocketException&) {}      // Discard it...
01029             }
01030             CallbackObjects.Unlock();
01031             connected = false;
01032         }
01033         protectSend.LeaveMutex();
01034         return -1;
01035     }
01036 }
01037
01038 int MsgSocket::SendCuttedMsg(int* tab_length, const char** tab_buf, int nb_buf)
01039 {
01040     int i;
01041     int SendLen;
01042     int TotalLen;
01043
01044     // Compute the len of all buffers
01045     for( SendLen = 0, i = 0; i < nb_buf; i ++ )
01046     {
01047         SendLen += tab_length[i];
01048     }
01049
01050     protectSend.EnterMutex();
01051     try
01052     {
01053         if ( SendLen > maxBIPMessageSize )
01054         {
01055             int HeaderSend      = 0;
01056             int BodySend        = 0;
01057             int TailerSend      = 0;
01058             // int ResSend              = 0;
01059
01060             // OmiscidTrace( "Message too big for one TCP frame (size=%d, sizemax=%d) sends many.\n", SendLen, maxMessageSizeForTCP);
01061
01062             // prepare buffer
01063             TotalLen = PrepareBufferForBip( (char*)SendBuffer, NULL, SendLen, true );
01064             if ( TotalLen == -1 )
01065             {
01066                 protectSend.LeaveMutex();
01067                 return -1;
01068             }
01069
01070             // We complete the header
01071             WriteHeaderForBip( (char*)SendBuffer, service_id, message_id );
01072
01073             // Increase the number for the next message
01074             message_id++;
01075
01076             // Send header
01077             HeaderSend = socket->Send(TotalLen, (char*)SendBuffer);
01078
01079             if ( HeaderSend != TotalLen )
01080             {
01081                 return -1;
01082             }
01083
01084             // Send all parts of the message
01085             for( i = 0; i < nb_buf; i ++ )
01086             {
01087                 TotalLen = socket->Send( tab_length[i], tab_buf[i] );
01088
01089                 if ( TotalLen == SOCKET_ERROR )
01090                 {
01091                     return -1;
01092                 }
01093
01094                 BodySend += TotalLen;
01095             }
01096
01097             // Send end of the message
01098             TailerSend = socket->Send( tag_end_size, tag_end );
01099             if ( TailerSend == -1 )
01100             {
01101                 return -1;
01102             }
01103
01104             return HeaderSend + BodySend + TailerSend;
01105         }
01106
01107
01108         TotalLen = PrepareBufferForBipFromCuttedMsg( (char*)SendBuffer, tab_length, tab_buf, nb_buf);
01109         if ( TotalLen == -1 )
01110         {
01111             protectSend.LeaveMutex();
01112             return -1;
01113         }
01114         // We complete the header
01115         WriteHeaderForBip( (char*)SendBuffer, service_id, message_id );
01116
01117 #ifdef DEBUG
01118         if ( Debug & DBG_SEND )
01119         {
01120             OmiscidTrace( "MsgSocket::SendPreparedBuffer %s\n", SendBuffer );
01121         }
01122 #endif
01123 
01124         // Increase the number for the next message
01125         ++message_id;
01126
01127         if ( (TotalLen = socket->Send(TotalLen, (char*)SendBuffer)) == -1)
01128         {
01129             TotalLen = -1;
01130         }
01131         protectSend.LeaveMutex();
01132         return TotalLen;
01133     }
01134     catch(SocketException& e)
01135     {
01136         OmiscidTrace( "SocketException: %s %d\n", e.msg.GetStr(), e.err);
01137         if ( connected )
01138         {
01139             // Send disconnected message
01140             CallbackObjects.Lock();
01141             // Send info to all listener
01142             for( CallbackObjects.First(); CallbackObjects.NotAtEnd(); CallbackObjects.Next() )
01143             {
01144                 try
01145                 {
01146                     CallbackObjects.GetCurrent()->Disconnected(*this, GetPeerPid());
01147                 }
01148                 catch(SocketException&) {} // Discard it
01149             }
01150             CallbackObjects.Unlock();
01151             connected = false;
01152         }
01153         protectSend.LeaveMutex();
01154         return -1;
01155     }
01156 }
01157
01158 int MsgSocket::	SendPreparedBuffer(int len, char* l_buffer)
01159 {
01160     if(l_buffer == NULL)
01161     {
01162         OmiscidError( "SendPreparedBuffer : NULL mesg\n" );
01163         throw MsgSocketException("Message NULL for TCP");
01164     }
01165
01166     if(len > maxMessageSizeForTCP)
01167     {
01168         OmiscidError( "Message too big for TCP (size=%d, sizemax=%d) so not sended.\n", len, maxMessageSizeForTCP);
01169         throw MsgSocketException("Message too big for TCP");
01170     }
01171
01172     protectSend.EnterMutex();
01173     try
01174     {
01175         // Here we've got a full buffer and we can (must) write our header at the in at the beginning !
01176         WriteHeaderForBip(l_buffer, service_id, message_id );
01177 #ifdef DEBUG
01178         if ( Debug & DBG_SEND )
01179         {
01180             OmiscidTrace( "MsgSocket::SendPreparedBuffer %s\n", l_buffer );
01181         }
01182 #endif
01183 
01184         message_id++;
01185
01186         //socket->Send(strlen(start_tag), start_tag);
01187         int res;
01188         if((res = socket->Send(len, l_buffer)) != -1)
01189         {
01190             protectSend.LeaveMutex();
01191             return res;
01192         }
01193         OmiscidTrace( "Erreur Send (-1)\n" );
01194         protectSend.LeaveMutex();
01195         return -1;
01196
01197     }
01198     catch(SocketException& e)
01199     {
01200         OmiscidTrace( "SocketException: %s %d\n", e.msg.GetStr(), e.err);
01201         if ( connected )
01202         {
01203             // Send disconnected message
01204             CallbackObjects.Lock();
01205             // Send info to all listener
01206             for( CallbackObjects.First(); CallbackObjects.NotAtEnd(); CallbackObjects.Next() )
01207             {
01208                 try
01209                 {
01210                     CallbackObjects.GetCurrent()->Disconnected(*this, GetPeerPid());
01211                 }
01212                 catch(SocketException&) {} // Discard it
01213             }
01214             CallbackObjects.Unlock();
01215             connected = false;
01216         }
01217         protectSend.LeaveMutex();
01218         return -1;
01219     }
01220 }
01221
01222
01223 int MsgSocket::SendTo(int len, const char* buf, UdpConnection* dest)
01224 {
01225     //   OmiscidTrace( "in MsgSocket::SendTo\n");
01226     //   OmiscidTrace( "send to pid : %u\n", dest->pid);
01227     if(len > UDP_MAX_MSG_SIZE){
01228         OmiscidError( "Message too big for UDP size=%d,  sizemax=%d\n", len, UDP_MAX_MSG_SIZE);
01229         throw MsgSocketException("Message too big for UDP");
01230     }
01231
01232     protectSend.EnterMutex();
01233     if ( buffer_udp_send == NULL )
01234     {
01235         buffer_udp_send = new OMISCID_TLM char[2048];
01236         if ( buffer_udp_send == NULL )
01237         {
01238             protectSend.LeaveMutex();
01239             return 0;
01240         }
01241     }
01242     try
01243     {
01244         struct sockaddr_in* destptr = &(dest->addr);
01245
01246         unsigned int total = tag_size+len+tag_end_size;
01247
01248         sprintf(buffer_udp_send, tag_str, service_id, message_id, len);
01249         ++message_id;
01250         sprintf((buffer_udp_send+total-tag_end_size), tag_end);
01251         memcpy(buffer_udp_send+tag_size, buf, len);
01252
01253         int TotalLen = socket->SendTo(total, buffer_udp_send, destptr);
01254         protectSend.LeaveMutex();
01255         return TotalLen;
01256
01257         //        socket->SendTo(strlen(start_tag), start_tag, destptr);
01258         //        socket->SendTo(len, buf, destptr);
01259         //        socket->SendTo(tag_end_size, tag_end, destptr);
01260
01261     }
01262     catch(SocketException& e)
01263     {
01264         OmiscidTrace( "SocketException: %s %d \n", e.msg.GetStr(), e.err);
01265         if ( connected )
01266         {
01267             // Send disconnected message
01268             CallbackObjects.Lock();
01269             // Send info to all listener
01270             for( CallbackObjects.First(); CallbackObjects.NotAtEnd(); CallbackObjects.Next() )
01271             {
01272                 try
01273                 {
01274                     CallbackObjects.GetCurrent()->Disconnected(*this,GetPeerPid());
01275                 }
01276                 catch(SocketException&) {} // Discard it
01277             }
01278             CallbackObjects.Unlock();
01279             connected = false;
01280         }
01281         protectSend.LeaveMutex();
01282         return -1;
01283     }
01284 }
01285
01286
01287
01288 int MsgSocket::GoodBeginning(unsigned char* buf, int len, unsigned int& lengthmsg, unsigned int& pid, unsigned int& mid)
01289 {
01290     if(len < tag_size)
01291     {
01292         //cerr << "longueur insuffisante\n";
01293         return 0;
01294     }
01295     else
01296     {
01297         if(sscanf((char*)buf, tag_str, &pid, &mid, &lengthmsg) != 3)
01298         {
01299             //cerr << "different\n";
01300             return 0;
01301         }
01302         else
01303         {
01304             return tag_size;
01305         }
01306     }
01307 }
01308
01309 bool MsgSocket::MoveToMessage(unsigned char* buf, int len, int& decal)
01310 {
01311     if(len < tag_size)
01312     {
01313         decal = 0;
01314         return false;
01315     }
01316     else
01317     {
01318         int i =0;
01319         while(i < len - tag_size
01320             && (memcmp(tag_start1, (buf+i), strlen(tag_start1)))
01321             /*&& (memcmp(tag_start2, (buf+i+tag_size-2), strlen(tag_start2)))*/)
01322         {
01323             ++i;
01324         }
01325         decal = i;
01326         return (i != len - tag_size);
01327     }
01328 }
01329
01330
01331 UdpConnection* MsgSocket::AcceptConnection(const UdpConnection& udp_connect, bool msg_empty)
01332 {
01333     OmiscidTrace( "AcceptConnection UDP (2)\n");
01334     if(msg_empty)
01335     {
01336         OmiscidTrace( "[Empty Msg]\n");
01337     }
01338     OmiscidTrace( "\n");
01339     return NULL;
01340 }
01341
01342 void MsgSocket::ReceiveUdpExchange()
01343 {
01344     try
01345     {
01346         if(socket->Select())
01347         {
01348
01349             //std::cerr << "in ReceiveUdpServer\n";
01350             int nb_read = socket->Recv(bufferSize-occupiedSize, (buffer+occupiedSize), &udpConnection.addr);
01351             //std::cerr << "nb_read=" << nb_read <<"\n";
01352             if(nb_read == 0)
01353             {
01354                 return ;
01355             }
01356
01357             UdpConnection* connection = NULL;
01358
01359             occupiedSize += nb_read;
01360
01361             bool stop = false;
01362             unsigned int length_msg;
01363             int length_header;
01364             int offset = 0;
01365             int size = occupiedSize;
01366             unsigned int pid, mid;
01367             while(!stop)
01368             {
01369                 if((length_header = GoodBeginning(buffer+offset, size, length_msg, pid, mid)) != 0)
01370                 {
01371                     //cerr << "good beginning ";
01372                     //cerr.write(aBuffer+offset, keyword_min);
01373                     //cerr << endl;
01374                     udpConnection.pid = pid;
01375                     // REVIEW a changer pour UDP
01376                     //    if(mid == 0)
01377                     //          {
01378                     //            peer_pid = pid;
01379                     //            offset += length_header;
01380                     //            connection = AcceptConnection(udpConnection, true);
01381                     //          }
01382                     //    else
01383                     if((unsigned int)size < length_header + length_msg + tag_end_size)
01384                     {
01385                         stop = true;
01386                     }
01387                     else
01388                     {
01389                         connection = AcceptConnection(udpConnection, false);
01390                         offset += length_header;
01391                         unsigned char* msgptr =  (buffer+offset);
01392
01393
01394                         //verif end tag
01395                         if(memcmp(tag_end, (msgptr + length_msg), tag_end_size))
01396                         {
01397                             OmiscidTrace( "warning end tag\n");
01398                             //ignore message, search for new header after the detected header
01399                             size =  occupiedSize - offset;
01400                         }
01401                         else
01402                         {
01403                             offset += length_msg + tag_end_size;
01404                             size =  occupiedSize - offset;
01405                             if(length_msg != 0)
01406                             {
01407                                 CallbackObjects.Lock();
01408                                 if( connection && CallbackObjects.GetNumberOfElements() )
01409                                 {
01410                                     *(msgptr+length_msg)='\0';
01411                                     callbackData.Msg.len = length_msg;
01412                                     callbackData.Msg.buffer =  (char*)msgptr;
01413                                     callbackData.Msg.origine = FromUDP;
01414                                     callbackData.Msg.pid = pid;
01415                                     callbackData.Msg.mid = mid;
01416                                     for( CallbackObjects.First(); CallbackObjects.NotAtEnd(); CallbackObjects.Next() )
01417                                     {
01418                                         try
01419                                         {
01420                                             CallbackObjects.GetCurrent()->Receive(*this, callbackData);
01421                                         }
01422                                         catch(SocketException& e)
01423                                         {
01424                                             // Unlock the list
01425                                             CallbackObjects.Unlock();
01426
01427                                             // Throw the exception
01428                                             throw e;
01429                                         }
01430                                     }
01431                                 }
01432                                 CallbackObjects.Unlock();
01433                             }
01434
01435                         }
01436                     }
01437                 }
01438                 else
01439                 {
01440                     //cerr << "Decalage\n";
01441                     int dec;
01442                     if(!MoveToMessage(buffer+offset, size, dec))
01443                     {
01444                         stop = true;
01445                         size -= dec;
01446                         offset += dec;
01447                     }
01448                     else
01449                     {
01450                         offset += dec;
01451                         size -= dec;
01452                     }
01453                 }
01454             }
01455             occupiedSize = size;
01456             if ( occupiedSize != 0 && offset != 0 )
01457             {
01458                 memmove(buffer, buffer+offset, occupiedSize);
01459             }
01460         }
01461     }
01462     catch(SocketException& e)
01463     {
01464         OmiscidTrace( "SocketException: %s %d\n", e.msg.GetStr(), e.err);
01465         if ( connected )
01466         {
01467             // Send disconnected message
01468             CallbackObjects.Lock();
01469             // Send info to all listener
01470             for( CallbackObjects.First(); CallbackObjects.NotAtEnd(); CallbackObjects.Next() )
01471             {
01472                 try
01473                 {
01474                     CallbackObjects.GetCurrent()->Disconnected(*this,GetPeerPid());
01475                 }
01476                 catch(SocketException&) {} // Discard it
01477             }
01478             CallbackObjects.Unlock();
01479             connected = false;
01480         }
01481     }
01482 }
01483
01484 unsigned short MsgSocket::GetPortNb() const
01485 {
01486     return socket->GetPortNb();
01487 }
01488
01489 const struct sockaddr_in* UdpConnection::getAddr() const
01490 {
01491     return &addr;
01492 }
01493
01494 bool UdpConnection::operator==(const UdpConnection& udp_connect) const
01495 {
01496     return !memcmp(&addr, udp_connect.getAddr(), sizeof(struct sockaddr));
01497 }
01498
01499 Socket* MsgSocket::GetSocket() const
01500 {
01501     return socket;
01502 }
01503
01504 bool MsgSocket::IsConnected() const
01505 {

01524 bool MsgSocket::ReceivedSyncLinkMsg()
01525 {
01526     bool tmpb;
01527     protectSend.EnterMutex();
01528     tmpb = receivedSyncLinkMsg;
01529     protectSend.LeaveMutex();
01530     return tmpb;
01531 }
01532
01538 bool MsgSocket::WaitSyncLinkMsg(unsigned int TimeToWait/* = 250 */)
01539 {
01540     ElapsedTime CountWaitedTime;
01541     while( connected == true )
01542     {
01543         if ( ReceivedSyncLinkMsg() || CountWaitedTime.Get() >= TimeToWait )
01544         {
01545             return true;
01546         }
01547         Thread::Sleep(10);
01548     }
01549     return false;
01550 }

01558 {
01559     return maxMessageSizeForTCP;

01561
01562 void MsgSocket::SetMaxMessageSizeForTCP(int max)
01563 {
01564     if ( max <= 0 )
01565         return;
01566
01567     if ( max > TCP_BUFFER_SIZE-1 )
01568     {
01569         maxMessageSizeForTCP = TCP_BUFFER_SIZE-1;
01570     }
01571     else
01572     {
01573         maxMessageSizeForTCP = max;
01574     }
01575     maxBIPMessageSize = maxMessageSizeForTCP - tag_size - tag_end_size;
01576 }

01579 {
